Json_Split.title: Why did we split the big json of DAG in workflow definition?
Json_Split.author: JinyLeeChina
Json_Split.desc: The task and relationship in the workflow of Dolphinscheduler is saved as the process_definition_json field that saves the process_definiton table in the database in a large JSON. If a workflow is large, this JSON field has become a result. Very big, you need to analyze JSON when using it, it costs very much, and the task cannot be reused, so the community plan launches the JSON split project.

DAG.title: Big Data Workflow Task Scheduling - Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) for Topological Sorting
DAG.author: LidongDai
DAG.desc: DAG: Full name Directed Acyclic Graph，referred to as DAG。Tasks in the workflow are assembled in the form of directed acyclic graphs, which are topologically traversed from nodes with zero indegrees of ingress until there are no successor nodes.
